item.description: Putnam has it's river fire event Aug 11, with Little Big Band (swing) playing in the park. I am thinking we could convene at my house around 3pm for refreshments, food, and games then carpool on to Putnam together. The event there starts at 6 pm.  If it's raining, we can just stay and play!  This is a mulit-group event so there will be others coming from other groups as well.  Fun!

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Rain or shine! Games then River Fire in Putnam-Little Big Band
